law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 74 sec. 27, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980; and ch. 264, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 13, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 289, sec. 2. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 18.
